meanings.definition: The state or quality of oozing or flowing slowly and thickly.
meanings.sent1: The ooziness of the mud made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the ooziness of the honey as I spread it on my toast.
meanings.sent3: The ooziness of the slime in the science experiment was both fascinating and gross.
meanings.sent4: The ooziness of the lava flowing down the volcano was a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The ooziness of the glue made it challenging to separate the stuck papers.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being slimy or viscous.
meanings.sent1: The ooziness of the slime on the frog's skin helped protect it from drying out.
meanings.sent2: The ooziness of the oil spill caused environmental concerns.
meanings.sent3: The ooziness of the pudding made it a fun and messy dessert.
meanings.sent4: The ooziness of the syrup dripping down the pancake created a sweet mess.
meanings.sent5: The ooziness of the lotion made it easy to apply smoothly on the skin.
